resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202712</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chutes and Ladders - Quadratic Equations Review</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rutschen und Strichleitern - quadratische 
Gleichungen Zusammenfassung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Descendeurs et échelles - revue quadratique 
d'équations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rampas e escadas - revisão quadrática das 
equações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scivoli e scalette - rassegna quadratica di 
equazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υδατοπτώσεις και σκάλες - δευτέρου βαθμού αναθεώρηση 
εξισώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Canales inclinados y escalas - revisión 
cuadrática de las ecuaciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is designed as a review lesson for solving quadratic equations. Students will play the game "Chutes and Ladders," modified for quadratic equations, as they review for the test.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist als Zusammenfassunglektion für 
das Lösen der quadratischen Gleichungen konzipiert. 
Kursteilnehmer spielen das Spiel "Rutschen und Strichleitern," 
geändert für quadratische Gleichungen, wie sie für den Test 
wiederholen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est conçue comme leçon de revue 
pour résoudre des équations quadratiques. Les étudiants 
joueront le jeu "descendeurs et échelles," modifié pour des 
équations quadratiques, comme ils passent en revue pour l'essai.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é projetada como uma lição da 
revisão para resolver equações quadráticas. Os estudantes 
jogarão o jogo "rampas e escadas," modificado para equações 
quadráticas, como revêem para o teste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è progettata come lezione di 
revisione per risolvere le equazioni quadratiche. Gli allievi 
giocheranno il gioco "scivoli e scalette," modificato per le equazioni
quadratiche, come rivedono per la prova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα σχεδιάζεται ως μάθημα αναθεώρησης για 
την επίλυση των δευτέρου βαθμού εξισώσεων. Οι σπουδαστές θα
παίξουν το παιχνίδι "υδατοπτώσεις και σκάλες," τροποποιημένος για
τις δευτέρου βαθμού εξισώσεις, όπως αναθεωρούν για τη δοκιμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se diseña como lección de la 
revisión para solucionar ecuaciones cuadráticas. Los 
estudiantes jugarán el juego "canales inclinados y escalas," 
modificado para las ecuaciones cuadráticas, como repasan para la 
prueba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107295</entry>
